INSPIRING BRAND DEVOTION, THAT'S WHAT HIEBING DOES BEST.
Hiebing is an integrated brand development and marketing agency with a healthy appetite for results and a sterling track record of driving sales. We handle anything and everything that connects people and brands: marketing strategy, insight research, touchpoint planning, media buying, advertising, graphic design, digital development, public relations, social media and content. We perform these valuable services for clients across the nation from our offices in the thriving capital cities of Madison and Austin.

Why us? Because we’re hardwired first to understand and then to act decisively. Then we find, design and deliver the most powerful interactions between consumers and these brands.

column119:
We Know Engineers.

Most engineers are skeptical of marketing, do not like being marketed to, and as business leaders, are dumbfounded by where to even begin with marketing given how it has transformed in the last decade. However, we have seen firsthand that marketing to technical audiences does work, but it has to be as smart as the people it targets.

TREW is a full-service marketing agency uniquely serving engineering and scientific companies that target technical audiences. We are marketers who get engineers. In fact, we wrote the book on it and are constantly researching how to be even smarter about it. We start with your business, your products and services, your application areas, and your competition. We seek to understand your unique situation, and then take the big concepts of inbound and content marketing and create a long-term, actionable plan that strengthens your brand and drives demand for your business. Every dollar and hour you spend with TREW helps you position your company to compete in technical markets and generate opportunities for your sales team.

column105: 48 Brook St, Manchester, NH 03104, United States
column119:
No matter the format, marketing is, always has been, and always will be, all about great ideas that make sense to people and are spread through some form of communication. The only questions for a business looking to attract attention from prospective customers are: "what are OUR great ideas"​, "how do we translate them for our customers"​, and "when/how/where should we communicate that message"​?

That's where we come in. Welcome to Grapevine Marketing, or as you may come to know us: the What, How, When, and Where of your marketing strategy.

Grapevine Marketing is a full-service digital marketing agency, specializing in SEO, SEM, social media, and inbound marketing. 

Through our strategy of determining the right marketing mix for your business and market's unique needs, meeting it head-on with targeted messaging and track-able campaigns that show you where every dollar was spent and how it performed, we are turning the traditional approach on its head.

If you're tired of throwing your money at marketing and advertising campaigns that just don't work, or you can't remember the last time someone called or emailed you saying they found your website, give us a call. We can brainstorm ideas over the phone, or setup a meeting to dive into your entire strategy. You'll be glad you picked up the phone.

column119:
The Clix Group is the top-ranked Digital Marketing Agency in the Midwest (with locations in St. Louis, MO and Little Rock, AR). We’ve been providing industry-leading results for our clients for over 18 years, getting them into the top spots on Google, Yahoo and Bing, and helping them find the RIGHT web visitors at the RIGHT time – and converting them into customers.

The Clix Group takes a creative customized approach to each client project.

Firstly, we value what our clients know. This pertains to their business, but it also pertains to our business. In order for us to market your business online, we need to understand your service. In the same manner, we expect our clients to take time to understand our service and what we’re trying to accomplish.  

Secondly, we value collaboration. There is not a day that goes by at Clix that our team members aren’t working with a client. Whether it’s phone calls, email exchanges, or in-person meetings, we take time to consult with or update our clients on a regular basis. Furthermore, we aren’t afraid to say “no.” Our approach to client relationship management is firmly rooted in transparency. If we have a suggestion that we believe can better our efforts, your business, and anything else related, we’ll voice our opinion. 

Finally, we value our ability to adapt. Working with a dynamic group that does not fence in their clients with tiered packages or hidden fees is a must, especially when the industry itself is at the mercy of Google, Bing, and Yahoo. We pivot on a dime. 

Education, collaboration, and adaptation fuel our inbound marketing campaigns, and we know that when our clients buy into our holistic approach, we’re no longer just vendors to them but true online marketing partners.

column119:
750+ People. 3 Continents. 18 Offices. We are a global integrated marketing agency transforming and inspiring the world of communications every day.

A LETTER FROM PETER FINN:

DECEMBER 2011. FINN PARTNERS WAS BORN. After 11 years serving as co-CEO of an historic agency that carried my father’s name— and mine!—and after 30+ years of working at the firm, I wanted to build something different, bold, meaningful and amazing for clients, our colleagues and the community. "Amazing"​ was, and is, for me an important word. I imagined we could be "amazing"​ every day, knowing this is a goal not always achieved but always pursued. A place where talented people could gather and do big things for clients as well as make a difference to the communities important to us.

WE LAUNCHED WITH A GROUP WHO SHARED A VISION. This was to be a "new"​ agency model, driven by a collaborative spirit. We asked, "Can we bind our 60-year legacy to the energy and speed of today’s hi-tech world?"​ We had $24 million in fees at our founding. Today, we have more than $85 million in fees, over 700 colleagues and 18 offices across three continents. Our Founding Managing Partners, highly respected colleagues who took the leap with me from our former agency, have been joined by the principals of other great agencies that became Finn Partner companies. So many other talented individuals are with us, too, intrigued by the idea of doing amazing things in an amazing workplace community.

WE’VE MADE OUR MARK QUICKLY. Finn Partners has been named “Best New Agency,” “Best PR Agency to Work for in North America” and“Best Mid-Sized Agency of the Year” three times. Now, we’re one of the world’s largest agencies.

WE ARE A YOUNG AGENCY. We share the genes of a respected agency that pioneered today’s integrated communications. But we are not them. We are unique. We are ourselves. We are focused on the future, building that future during each amazing day.

Grant Marketing is a brand development and integrated inbound marketing agency specializing in business-to-business communication and services for manufacturing, technology, distribution, and business service companies. 

Based in Boston, Grant Marketing leverages its many years of experience to help our clients grow their businesses beyond expectations. We do this through a proprietary brand development process, integrated marketing, and advertising campaigns shaped by thorough research and analysis of both your business and the marketplace.

For your company to be successful in today's marketplace you need to communicate to your audience at many touch points, both in print and online. Grant Marketing has the expertise to take your company to the next level by integrating your offline and online marketing campaigns.

column119:
We are a full-service B2B marketing agency and a HubSpot Silver Partner bringing world-class marketing services to startups and enterprises. Your growth is our focus, and we accomplish it by putting together a robust B2B marketing strategy.

B2B marketing and lead generation for SaaS businesses is complicated. At SeeResponse, we make it simple. Each day, we come to work because we love to solve some of those most interesting marketing problems for our SaaS clients.

We are a digital-savvy bunch of passionate B2B marketers. Our expertise and experience in marketing strategy and execution bring to the software technology businesses world-class marketing services, without having to spend gazillions of dollars.

We love making an impact. We hire, train and invest in top talent to help our desire to push creative & marketing boundaries and create value for our clients.

Our goal is to help you increase brand awareness and drive qualified leads to your business. We belong. We believe in every service we sell and always strive to provide you with sustainable marketing solutions.

Just thinking execution? We can still help. Outsource your tactical marketing, so you can invest in strategy and focus on your core. You keep the emphasis on the broader goal, while we become the means to reach that goal. Together, we scale faster, into something that’s set up to be profitable and sustainable.

We believe in every service we offer and always strive to provide you with sustainable marketing solutions.

Our typical client engagement begins with a discovery exercise to understand the key challenges and pain points. We then put together a custom strategy with the focus on the best marketing channels for growth and execute upon them. Think of us as an extension to your existing team in both strategy and execution.

TALK TO US. WE’RE FRIENDLY PEOPLE!

column119:
In 2019, MCC became a wholly owned subsidiary of Mod Op, a digital marketing agency with offices across the U.S. and Panama.

With so much riding on marketing communications, brands need an agency partner with expertise and a long track record of results. Dallas-based MCC, now Mod Op Dallas, believes brands should engage customers with a balanced story of logic and emotion. Mod Op Dallas has partnered with B2B and B2C clients to provide full-service, integrated advertising, public relations and social media marketing. The agency’s experience ranges from technology, energy, insurance and real estate to finance, retail, health, security and entertainment. 

Mod Op Dallas has helped companies in virtually every industry achieve their business objectives through better marketing communications. The agency’s experience is broad and, in several areas, deep. Originally founded to serve high-tech clients, the company has since expanded its scope with the technology space continuing to be one of its strong suits. Mod Op Dallas has experience serving these industries and more:

-	Consumer Electronics
-	Embedded Products
-	Energy
-	Entertainment
-	Enterprise IT
-	Financial Services
-	Network Carrier Infrastructure
-	Security

column105: 301 E 57th St, New York, United States
column119:
750+ People. 3 Continents. 18 Offices. We are a global integrated marketing agency transforming and inspiring the world of communications every day.

A LETTER FROM PETER FINN:

DECEMBER 2011. FINN PARTNERS WAS BORN. After 11 years serving as co-CEO of an historic agency that carried my father’s name— and mine!—and after 30+ years of working at the firm, I wanted to build something different, bold, meaningful and amazing for clients, our colleagues and the community. "Amazing"​ was, and is, for me an important word. I imagined we could be "amazing"​ every day, knowing this is a goal not always achieved but always pursued. A place where talented people could gather and do big things for clients as well as make a difference to the communities important to us.

WE LAUNCHED WITH A GROUP WHO SHARED A VISION. This was to be a "new"​ agency model, driven by a collaborative spirit. We asked, "Can we bind our 60-year legacy to the energy and speed of today’s hi-tech world?"​ We had $24 million in fees at our founding. Today, we have more than $85 million in fees, over 700 colleagues and 18 offices across three continents. Our Founding Managing Partners, highly respected colleagues who took the leap with me from our former agency, have been joined by the principals of other great agencies that became Finn Partner companies. So many other talented individuals are with us, too, intrigued by the idea of doing amazing things in an amazing workplace community.

WE’VE MADE OUR MARK QUICKLY. Finn Partners has been named “Best New Agency,” “Best PR Agency to Work for in North America” and“Best Mid-Sized Agency of the Year” three times. Now, we’re one of the world’s largest agencies.

WE ARE A YOUNG AGENCY. We share the genes of a respected agency that pioneered today’s integrated communications. But we are not them. We are unique. We are ourselves. We are focused on the future, building that future during each amazing day.
Web development & Marketing Agency. International expertise.

Folio Fine Wine Partners is a full-service importer and marketing agency that manages a collection of exceptional wines worldwide. Our goal is to become the preeminent purveyor of the finest wines from the world's premier and emerging wine regions.

The Michael Mondavi family established Folio Fine Wine Partners in 2004 with the goal of bringing exceptional and distinctive wines to American consumers. Today, we are an importer, fine wine agency and producer of quality wines. We manage a diverse portfolio that spans 6 countries, 3 continents and every premium price point, and we’re fortunate to work with family wineries who share our passion for making great wine.

Wine has been the Mondavi family business for 4 generations. It began with Cesare Mondavi, an Italian immigrant, who established a grape growing business in Lodi, California during Prohibition. Our Napa Valley roots were established in 1943 when the family purchased the historic Charles Krug winery. Cesare’s son, Robert, later started his own winery with Michael, his eldest son. Robert Mondavi Winery helped establish California as the premier winegrowing region it is today. Now the legacy continues with Folio Fine Wine Partners.

column119:
Green Stick Marketing is a full-service digital marketing agency. Our excellent team develops effective digital marketing strategies for forward-thinking partners. We stand behind our work and the service that we provide to our customers. Marketing is what makes us happy! Allow us to take the load off and free you up to focus on what makes you happy; whether that's spending more time with family, increasing revenue, or growing your business and career. 

We know Digital is the present AND the future vehicle of human connection. But at the end of the day, it's not about the technology at all. It's about Humanity. Today people have unlimited access to information and inspiration. Because of that, the choices they make become increasingly more selective.

Now marketing requires authenticity and flexibility, rather than just money. Businesses need to understand and articulate the human value they deliver, in a way that resonates with their clients.  Our job is to help share that story. We have to share that message on all of the right platforms, and networks. And it must be in the format that's clear to both humans and machines.

To make this level of marketing available to all, we created a coalition, borrowed dozens of ideas from how other industries work, and created our business model reliant on collaboration in our industry, rather than competition.

It takes a team of creative and technical experts who are well educated and equipped, working as a team to strategically understand and tell the stories that create a real human connection in the digital world.

HISTORY
Green Stick Marketing was founded with a broad vision, setting a new standard for how we believed marketing ought to be done. We believe that success in digital marketing is a real human connection that merely's augmented by the skillful use of technology. Because of that, we know that we have to continually pioneer new practices and techniques as communities change and technologies arise.

JDR Consulting Group is a fast-growing marketing agency that supports businesses by managing their Amazon marketing & operations in the U.S. and also abroad.

We have massive goals, and a massive vision to help three important segments:
1. Small businesses
2. Everyday Consumers
3. America’s future & economy

(visit our website to see how we work tirelessly to achieve this vision: www.jdrconsultinggroupllc.com)

WHO WE ARE & HOW WE GOT STARTED
 
We used to develop data driven Amazon marketing plans for our own retail business, now we help brands do the same.

Our CEO, Jonathan David started and grew three businesses to seven figures with unique marketing strategies by looking at hidden Amazon data.  Over the last three years, brands have been knocking on our door to have experience the same success on Amazon, so we decided to help. 
 
There are two main ways we can grow brands on Amazon:

1. We get you set up on Amazon and execute our custom data-driven Amazon marketing plans (recommended)
2. We give the brand a PO (like a traditional retailer/distributor) and are granted exclusive rights of the Amazon marketplace. 
 
We believe that brands are truly under-served on the Amazon channel and are missing out on sales in a huge way. Imagine if you could add an additional seven figure revenue stream to your business? How far would that increase go towards supporting your business mission, your employees, your growth plans?

column119:
We are a digital marketing and emerging technology recruiting and staffing firm. We provide full-time and contract resources. We are former digital marketing agency owners, strategists, marketers and project managers. Most of all, we are partnership-minded team builders here to help you build your digital and integrated marketing teams. 

Clients often tell us, prior to working with TeamBuilder Search, they worked with recruiters that did not understand the digital, integrated marketing or emerging technology landscape. Clients also tell us that they were often “sold” candidates and pushed toward a transaction. We often hear from candidates that they were instructed to mislead prospective employers and pushed toward positions that did not seem like a fit. We call this type of thinking a “transactional” mindset. You will never experience a transactional mindset while working with us. 

TeamBuilder Search was founded because we believe that recruiting should be and could be better. Recruiters should have deep knowledge of the niche they serve and recruiters should have a team building mindset as opposed to a transactional mindset. It is incredibly satisfying to help a client and a candidate both succeed. Our focus is developing healthy, productive relationships while producing great results for clients and candidates.

column119:
750+ People. 3 Continents. 18 Offices. We are a global integrated marketing agency transforming and inspiring the world of communications every day.

A LETTER FROM PETER FINN:

DECEMBER 2011. FINN PARTNERS WAS BORN. After 11 years serving as co-CEO of an historic agency that carried my father’s name— and mine!—and after 30+ years of working at the firm, I wanted to build something different, bold, meaningful and amazing for clients, our colleagues and the community. "Amazing"​ was, and is, for me an important word. I imagined we could be "amazing"​ every day, knowing this is a goal not always achieved but always pursued. A place where talented people could gather and do big things for clients as well as make a difference to the communities important to us.

WE LAUNCHED WITH A GROUP WHO SHARED A VISION. This was to be a "new"​ agency model, driven by a collaborative spirit. We asked, "Can we bind our 60-year legacy to the energy and speed of today’s hi-tech world?"​ We had $24 million in fees at our founding. Today, we have more than $85 million in fees, over 700 colleagues and 18 offices across three continents. Our Founding Managing Partners, highly respected colleagues who took the leap with me from our former agency, have been joined by the principals of other great agencies that became Finn Partner companies. So many other talented individuals are with us, too, intrigued by the idea of doing amazing things in an amazing workplace community.

WE’VE MADE OUR MARK QUICKLY. Finn Partners has been named “Best New Agency,” “Best PR Agency to Work for in North America” and“Best Mid-Sized Agency of the Year” three times. Now, we’re one of the world’s largest agencies.

WE ARE A YOUNG AGENCY. We share the genes of a respected agency that pioneered today’s integrated communications. But we are not them. We are unique. We are ourselves. We are focused on the future, building that future during each amazing day.

Digital Poseidon LLC is an Internet marketing agency that helps local business and corporate firms reach top ranking on the major search engines. We have helped hundreds of businesses own their market and blow away their competition online. This helped our clients reach more customers and increase revenues. What separates Digital Poseidon from amateur Search Engine Optimization companies online is that we take the time to research your business and your competition. We will perform a web analysis of your website and design a custom SEO package to meet your needs and budget. Unlike other SEO companies, we take the time to get to know everything about you, your business, and the type of clients you are targeting. This also helps to ensure a successful SEO campaign, which helps lead to more sales and profit for your business. 

At Digital Poseidon integrity is our motto. There are many companies in our industry that take your money and guarantee you a number one ranking on the major search engines. This is FALSE. NO company can make that guarantee. If they do they are lying. Not even a surgeon can guarantee a successful operation. Digital Poseidon was founded in 2015 by David Melo, an SEO Expert with over ten years experience. He has received training from Nationally Recognized SEO Experts, Ranked thousands of businesses, and has personally trained each and every one of his employees. He as well as his employees attend seminars and conventions all over the globe to get stay current in the field. The team at Digital Poseidon follows a formula that has worked for thousands of businesses and can help yours reach the top. 

What do you get when you choose Digital Poseidon?

You get a company that has over 10 years experience doing search engine optimization. SEO changes all the time and needs to be handled carefully. Our team of experts is ready to help your business succeed online. Get started today you will be glad you chose us!

Recently Feature in Boston Voyager Magazine  http://bostonvoyager.com/interview/meet-david-melo-digital-poseidon-bostons-financial-district/

Pyne’s impressive track record of crafting innovative corporate strategies with current market opportunities has created billions of dollars in shareholder value and is the cornerstone of Bruin Sports Capital’s investment philosophy.

Pyne is backed by influential investors who were attracted to his long-standing professional ties and his record of accomplishment. Pyne has assembled a team of experts who have transformed some of the biggest global sports brands over the past three decades. The company’s investor base, along with Pyne’s reputation and global network, provides Bruin Sports Capital with unique deal flow, flexible, long-term capital, operational excellence and a heightened speed of execution. 

Bruin Sports Capital is quickly building impressive global platform businesses with a portfolio of creative, forward thinking companies: Engine Shop, an experiential sports, entertainment and lifestyle marketing agency; On Location Experiences, an inventive, premium hospitality business; and Courtside Ventures, an early-stage venture capital fund investing in companies that are transforming the intersection of sports, media and technology; and deltatre, an international leader in sport media and technology: digital, mobile, social, broadcast, data, content and live streaming services.

column119: We are COMM (formerly CommCreative). The power of data + the art of storytelling.

At Veda Intell, we help businesses get closer to their customers - for more growth, better decisions, and consistent progress. 

Our mission is to help you:

👍🏼 Achieve CLARITY by identifying and understanding the customers that drive your business.
👍🏼 Build a CONNECTION with your customers to retain them and attract more of them.
👍🏼 Actively COLLABORATE with your best customers to drive innovation and growth. 
👍🏼 Seek CONTINUOUS Improvement by applying customer intelligence company-wide.

In today’s highly competitive and rapidly changing world, it’s truer than ever:

Whoever gets and stays closer to the customer - WINS.

How we work:

COLLABORATING WITH YOUR CUSTOMERS
We create and expertly moderate customer conversations and virtual customer advisory communities composed of your best customers. Critical real-time insights on the topics most important to you. All from the customers that matter most to your business.

MAKING YOUR DATA WORK FOR YOU
Working with the data and systems you currently have in place, we analyze and segment your customer and transactional data. We then provide you with actionable insights into customer behaviors, characteristics, and customer value.

YOUR STRATEGIC ADVISORY TEAM
We help you avoid stagnation by applying customer insights and intelligence to support continuous improvement throughout your organization. We can also communicate with your marketing agency, so they know exactly whom to target (and finally get the results you’ve both been hoping for).

To learn more and to take our free 20-question assessment, please visit www.vedaintell.com. 

If you would like to book a call to discuss your results and how we can help, please email therman@vedaintell.com

M Street, LLC is an established, full-service web development and marketing agency providing fresh, inspired service to our clients. We are an agile web design agency based in Lancaster, PA.

Web Design

Our team of web development professionals specializes in creating, developing, and maintaining your website to maximize your company's potential to attract and serve your target customer.

Your website will be fully-customized with equal attention given to the front end design "look and feel", as well as the back end programming and database.

Application Programming

At M Street, we can also create any application for any client. If you can dream it up, we can make it happen. Our client-specific web applications will be dynamic and state-of-the art to grab and maintain the attention of your intended audience.

SEO

A beautiful, easy-to-navigate website is ineffectual when none of your potential customers can find it. Our conversion-oriented Search Engine Optimization experts will work with you to ensure your website isn't just another pretty face lost in the crowd. Ensure your on-page optimization is working for you!

Social Media & Link Building

Link building is the secret weapon for driving traffic to your website and helping you achieve a higher ranking in search engine results. Acquiring trustworthy incoming links is crucial for your company's success in today's competitive web-based business world.

We'll create a customized link-building campaign based on your target market, focusing on both the quality and quantity of your backlinks from relevant, established sources. More clicks means more traffic, and more traffic means more potential customers visiting your site.

Contact M Street LLC today to see how we can deliver traffic to your business!

Fenway Sports Management (FSM) is a leading sports marketing agency that represents blue-chip brands and elite athletes, and produces world-class events on sports'​ biggest stages.
 
Exclusive Property Sales and Representation:
A wholly owned subsidiary of Fenway Sports Group, Fenway Sports Management serves as the sponsorship sales arm for its prestigious portfolio of sports entities: the Boston Red Sox, Liverpool Football Club, New England Sports Network (NESN) and Roush Fenway Racing. FSM is the exclusive sales agency for Major League Baseball Advanced Media (MLBAM), PGA TOUR Playoff event The Dell Technologies Championship and Boston College Athletics. FSM is the exclusive marketing agency for LeBron James through a strategic partnership with LRMR.
 
Consulting & Event Management:
With more than a century of industry experience, Fenway Sports Management shapes sports marketing strategies and delivers winning activation programs for premier global brands and properties, including Dunkin’ Donuts, jetBlue Airways, Stop & Shop, Gulf Oil, Expect Miracles Foundation and the Red Sox Foundation.

Fenway Park Special Events:
From world-class soccer to professional and college hockey to intimate concerts in the bleachers, Fenway Sports Management conceptualizes, produces, and promotes marquee sporting and entertainment events at Fenway Park, including Citi Frozen Fenway, AIG Hurling Classic & Irish Festival, Buick Football at Fenway, Polartec Big Air, High School Football, and select concerts.
 
FSM Start Ups & Subsidiaries:
Fenway Sports Management has successfully incubated a number of innovative consumer sports ventures including FanFoto, MLB Destinations, and the Red Sox Fantasy Camp and Youth Baseball Summer Camp programs. FSM also owns and operates the Salem Red Sox, the Advance Class A Affiliate of the Boston Red Sox.

Via is re-engineering public transit, from a regulated system of rigid routes and schedules to a fully dynamic, on-demand network. Via's mobile app connects multiple passengers who are headed the same way, allowing riders to seamlessly share a premium vehicle. First launched in New York City in September 2013, the Via platform operates in the United States and in Europe through its joint venture with Mercedes-Benz Vans, ViaVan. Via's technology is also deployed worldwide through dozens of partner projects with public transportation agencies, private transit operators, taxi fleets, private companies, and universities, seamlessly integrating with public transit infrastructure to power cutting-edge on-demand mobility.

We’re looking for entrepreneurs who are excited about getting in on the ground floor of a fast-growing start-up; imaginative thinkers who relish wearing multiple hats and never back down from a challenge. We want people who get things done.

Are you looking to take your website from being a brochure which is all about your school, to a tool which is strategically built and delivers personalized experiences for your prospective students/parents, current students/parents, and faculty?

MKG Marketing is a digital marketing agency with offices in Seattle, Portland, and New Orleans.

What we specialize in:

- Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
- Pay Per Click (Paid Search, Display, and Social Media Advertising)
- Web and Campaign Analytics

Who do we provide services for mainly technology or medical companies, although our current portfolio spans:
- B2B Technology Companies
- Healthcare
- Internet

What makes us different than all our competitors?

1. Senior Talent Only. All MKG team members have at least 9 years of experience in their core area of expertise. This has led to lower employee turnover; MKG boasts a 100% full time team member retention rate, better than the Small Business Administration (SBA) benchmark of 62%.
2. 100% Agreement on Client Roster: We only work with companies whose product or service we believe in. Everyone votes when new clients come in the door. Need 100% all YES's from every MKG team member to work with that client.
3. Google Agency partner. Less than 5% of agencies see this level of support. We receive access to new AdWords (Search/Display), YouTube and Google Search insights.
4. Scrum Based Company. One of the key reasons we work well with technology clients? We are a scrum-based organization.

A little about us: Our Values
1. People First: Our employees are the most important thing to us. Their happiness is our priority. Their families are an extension of our team.
2. Exceeding Expectations: Our team goes above and beyond. We think on your feet, take the outline of a task, own it and run with it.
3. Selfless Pride: We function as a team. We win together. One person may have sparked the idea, but we all made it happen.
4. Big Picture: We think high level and work our way into the logistics. This keeps our ideas fresh and the possibilities endless.
5. Fearless: We’re not afraid to fail. Failure leads to learning. Learning leads to doing better next time. It’s in those moments our best work was produced

We're not your typical digital marketing agency. (un)Common Logic is a digital marketing agency located in Austin, Texas with clients on almost every continent. Our talented team of experts relentlessly pursue excellence in marketing performance and high-touch customer service. We solve the hard problems in digital marketing by using data to (un)cover surprising details, then using human intelligence to leverage that information for (un)common results. 

We are a Google Premier Partner (top 2% of all agencies), a Facebook Partner Agency, and have been included on the Austin-American Statesman's Top Workplaces list eight times. 

We've always been uncommon ...

...but we haven't always been (un)Common Logic. For the first 10 years of our existence, we were known as 360Partners. But over those 10 years, our clients and partners told us that our previous name didn’t fully capture what set us apart:

- The tireless pursuit of excellence
- A meticulous approach to understanding data
- Authentic client service based on transparency and integrity

We finally remedied that in 2018, and embraced our true identity as (un)Common Logic.

The days of “one simple trick” and hacks are long gone. The sophistication and complexity of today’s digital marketing landscape calls for a different approach. By diligently seeking ways to optimize our clients’ digital marketing down to the last detail, we’ve been able to achieve impressive results year over year across a spectrum of industries.

We’re a digital marketing agency with a proven track record of producing spine-chilling ROI for businesses.

We leverage our cutting-edge sales and marketing software, A.I. (artificial intelligence) automations, proven lead follow-up systems, database revival strategy, advanced advertising expertise, and passion for storytelling through content creation to deliver an unmatched impact to the bottom line of the companies we partner with.

Established in September 1993, Pacific Image Electronics Co., Ltd. (PIE) is the pioneer of scanning and imaging solution provider. With strong R&D capabilities and extensive experience, PIE has become a leader in film scanner market and the best partner providing quality design and manufacturing services to giant brands such as Kodak, KIS for film scanning solution.

Besides high quality and high value creation in film scanning solutions, PIE has extended its product development into different industrial applicationss and biotechnology solutions include gel documentation system, chemiluminescent imaging system, advanced bio detection platform and diagnostic instruments since early 2000.

PIE’s vision is to deliver innovative solutions for biotechnology and image scanning products that make people’s lives better and healthier. We aggressively and continuously invests in advanced technology to strengthen our development and manufacture capabilities. With our expertise, passion and focus, we pride ourselves in being able to provide comprehensive products and services to the market via different business model such as OBM/ODM/OEM.

column119:
Aim is a marketing agency dedicated to creating insanely great brand experiences for our clients. And, although we've been around for over 15 years, we're doing things in a fresh, new way. But, what exactly is a brand experience?

Is it a logo? Slogan? Lifestyle photography? Packaging or product design? Merchandising, in-store displays, demos, or other retail activation? Ad campaigns? Events and sponsorships? Websites, digital content, social media...or maybe mobile apps? PR, social good or corporate sustainability efforts? Or customer service? Employee recruitment or engagement programs? 

Our answer is "YES!" to all of these. Creating amazing brand experience involves a process of learning which of all the various points of contact are most important to connecting and engaging with your audiences then applying a laser-like focus on making sure all those things are delivering the same consistent message, the same great experience of why your brand is different and better at solving your customers problems and fulfilling their dreams. And you forget about everything else!

We've developed a unique capability of designing brand experiences that take traditional forms of marketing, impacting consumers offline then amplifying them online with digital content, communities and connections...reaching and engaging even more. As a result, your marketing program generates greater awareness and buzz at reduced costs and ultimately, we're all successful in helping you sell more stuff!
Marketing Agency • Specialties: Social Media

column119:
Big Leap has been a trusted digital marketing agency since 2008. We help businesses elevate their online marketing strategy to earn lucrative, long-term results. 

Our Story
CEO and founder Bryan Phelps developed an interest in SEO during college. But, after witnessing empty promises that eroded client relationships and workplace cultures, Bryan decided to do things differently. He founded Big Leap with a clear purpose: to offer brands sustainable growth solutions they can trust.

Our Services 
Our team is well-versed in providing customized digital marketing solutions via essential services: 

SEO Marketing
Content Marketing
Reputation Management
Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO)
Paid Advertising

We don’t believe one service is inherently superior to the other; we believe each strategy possesses the power to maximize the strengths of the others. 

The results? Solidifying authentic connections with those who matter most to your business.

Our Core Values
Big Leap embodies three core values to drive the best outcomes: 

Character: We check our egos at the door, do what we say, and do our best to be candid but caring. 
Competence: We master our craft, stay updated on industry shifts, and collaborate to inspire confidence.
Community: Our team members express ideas, provide feedback, and give first to invest in relationships.

Our AI Policy
Big Leap firmly stands by a human-centered approach when it comes to AI. In other words: 

We believe AI technologies should be assistive, not autonomous. AI technology use is human-powered and monitored in areas such as technical SEO (schema, hreflang tags, striking distance, etc.), data (collection, organization, analysis), and content development tasks (outlines, ideation, research, etc.).

We believe human knowledge, experience, feelings, and imagination are crucial for creativity. 

Learn more about what our SEO agency can do by connecting with us at https://www.bigleap.com/about-us/

"Trustway Marketing"​ is Alabama's leading digital marketing community and the go-to platform for learning, networking and growing you Business online"​

Our strategies and Campaigns are built to make a lasting impact. Our relentless curiosity, accountability, and passion equate to a constant mission to improve marketing. We’re the partner you’ve been looking for.

Our founder and CEO, David Hall, owns a bunch of companies. David's background is in business coaching and consulting, we always took a more consultative approach to marketing. Clients got to talking and bringing more clients and asking for more help. Thus, Trustway marketing was born.

Marketing... For some people, it sounds scary. For others, it seems mystical. Maybe even a pain in the rear?

You have questions like:
1. What's the best way to market my business online?
2. What are the most effective marketing strategies?

We get it! It can be stressful. What's worse is that almost every digital marketing agency out there is full of salespeople that want to sell you their product or service, but really aren't all that helpful.

What does marketing help really look like? It's pretty simple. Helping you figure out what the best strategies to grow your business are based on your needs. Isn't that what it's supposed to be all about anyway?

We've found most often when we speak with businesses wanting to maximize their marketing efforts, they have heard all the buzzwords like SEO, PPC, AdWords, etc, but really aren't 100% certain what their own needs are. They know what they want to accomplish, but the how to go about it can get lost among all of the marketing messages out there.

We're different. Our number one goal is to help you figure out exactly what you need and what will work best for your goals.

We want to become an extension of our clients’ marketing teams, delivering online marketing solutions both parties can be proud of. And how can we be an extension if we aren’t connecting and reviewing projects every week? Email updates are nice, but nothing beats hearing the inflection in a client’s voice when we share the good news. It is for this reason that we connect with our clients every single week. You can rest assured knowing that your brand is always on our mind when we’re providing online digital marketing services.

We understand that digital marketing has never been more competitive, which is why we stick to what we have always focused on: driving ROI. How do we do this? We help you connect with the right customers through our internet marketing services. Whether through social media or search engine optimization, we work to increase your brand's online presence in a meaningful way.

One of the reasons we're so confident in our ability to deliver amazing results is that we have experts in each key digital channel. From SEO and PPC to social media and PR, we work together to ensure our clients see the best results of each campaign. For us, efficiency and results are the names of the game.

column119:
Power Digital is a growth marketing firm fueled by technology and driven by a talented team of consultative marketers, creatives, analysts and technologists. We ignite revenue growth and brand recognition for leading and emerging brands around the world.

Marketing is no longer about a singular offer or what your brand presents visually. It’s a sprawling journey with countless touch points. 

Consumers shop with their values and gravitate towards brands they trust. They want to be a part of a tribe. A story. What’s more, the path to purchase needs to be fast, frictionless and personable.

The media landscape is vastly different, too. Measurement is smarter but also harder than ever. 

Marketing should be a strategic business driver, a road that leads to profitable revenue growth and brand lift.

We take the guesswork out of marketing, making the most from your investment so you get what you really care about: growth, handled from planning to execution.

Our experienced team develops custom marketing playbooks fueled by your data, market trends and industry insights to set you apart from the competition, designed to drive revenue and brand lift.

Our proprietary technology, nova, analyzes a company’s digital ecosystem using multiple first-party data sources to build informed and custom marketing plans. And, nova de-risks investments by optimizing capital allocation––putting marketers, operators and the investment community in a strategic seat at the table.

When you know the customer journey, singular channels don’t matter because you’re building a strategic program. That’s what we are in the business of: igniting growth and brand recognition for the brands we are lucky to call our clients.

You may have come to know Valpak as the “coupon mailer people” and you wouldn’t be wrong. Since 1968, Valpak has been mailing coupons to consumers to save them money and support small, local businesses in communities throughout North America. That’s what we were. Valpak has grown up, just as a teenager develops into a confident adult. 

Today, we’re a full-service marketing agency.  We provide industry leading, traditional and digital marketing solutions to local and national businesses. With Valpak, you’ll still find the coupons that we’re known for, only now you’ll find them online and in digital apps as well as in our iconic Blue Envelope®. We mail to 38 million homes and drive over 11 million in daily online traffic. 

From The Blue Envelope to website design, development and everything in between, Valpak supports small businesses with a full suite of innovative marketing services.

The best thing about Valpak? We’re right there, where you are, in your neighborhood. With over 150 franchise locations and growing, you’ll benefit from your own, personal Valpak ally to guide your marketing decisions and help your business prosper. 

It’s your neighborhood. Get out in it. 

Call Valpak at 1-866-235-0870 or visit us at www.valpak.com/advertise.

column119:
Intention.ly is a growth engine design consultancy and marketing agency that launched in early 2021, at a time when financial services companies were scrambling to evolve their business models to account for the overnight shift in the way consumers were purchasing products and interacting with brands. 

Having led marketing at some of the largest and most successful fintech firms, the team behind Intention.ly believes that marketing can and should be utilized as a strategic driver of company vision and revenue. It is their mission to help company leaders reimagine their approach to growth by championing the value and impact modern marketing can have. 

While Intention.ly works with a wide range of fintech and finserv companies– including start-ups looking to outsource their go-to-market planning, growth stage firms looking for advice and counsel on how to turbocharge their marketing efforts, and established firms looking to modernize their outdated ways– the biggest commonality amongst their clients is their willingness to be bold and creative in their approach to driving revenue. Intention.ly clients are excited to change, evolve, and push boundaries and they want a partner to challenge, advise and run alongside them, in reaching their growth goals.  

Be inspired to change the way you think about growth.

With an unquenchable thirst for realizing the impossible, we view every challenge as an opportunity for innovation and take pride in exploding the status quo. WHAT WE DO

column119:
1400+ People. 3 Continents. 35 Offices. We are a global integrated marketing agency transforming and inspiring the world of communications every day.

A LETTER FROM PETER FINN:

DECEMBER 2011. FINN PARTNERS WAS BORN. After 11 years serving as co-CEO of a historic agency that carried my father’s name— and mine!—and after 30+ years of working at the firm, I wanted to build something different, bold, meaningful and amazing for clients, our colleagues and the community. "Amazing"​ was, and is, for me an important word. I imagined we could be "amazing"​ every day, knowing this is a goal not always achieved but always pursued. A place where talented people could gather and do big things for clients as well as make a difference to the communities important to us.

WE LAUNCHED WITH A GROUP WHO SHARED A VISION. This was to be a "new"​ agency model, driven by a collaborative spirit. We asked, "Can we bind our 60-year legacy to the energy and speed of today’s hi-tech world?"​ We had $24 million in fees at our founding. Today, we have more than $85 million in fees, over 700 colleagues and 18 offices across three continents. Our Founding Managing Partners, highly respected colleagues who took the leap with me from our former agency, have been joined by the principals of other great agencies that became Finn Partner companies. So many other talented individuals are with us, too, intrigued by the idea of doing amazing things in an amazing workplace community.

WE’VE MADE OUR MARK QUICKLY. Finn Partners has been named “Best New Agency,” “Best PR Agency to Work for in North America” and“Best Mid-Sized Agency of the Year” three times. Now, we’re one of the world’s largest agencies.

WE ARE A YOUNG AGENCY. We share the genes of a respected agency that pioneered today’s integrated communications. But we are not them. We are unique. We are ourselves. We are focused on the future, building that future during each amazing day.

column119:
About Us? It's about YOU!
Goodbye Corporate Egos – You Won’t be Missed.

Finally, we meet. We’ve been waiting for this moment. In real time, you’re witnessing the end of the traditional “About Us” page. Once you finish the next sentence? It’s out of your life forever. There. Gone. At least when it comes to our relationship and luxury properties in Arizona. Our point? Brands don’t make companies great. Great clients make companies great.

When Did Businesses Start Thinking Me, Me, Me?
We’re not sure yet we suspect it was around 2003. You know, when website coders first convinced businesses that they needed a website (they did). The problem? Coders, typically, aren’t Brand Managers and/or Marketing Execs. Yup 2003, that’s when businesses forgot consumers come first. So what are WE about? Making you an insider when it comes to the finest off-market properties, high-end condos, luxury homes, and VIP lifestyles found in Arizona.

When you’re ready? We”ll be here.

Squad started out as a marketing agency, specialising in interactive technologies development. Every year, the owners of the agency asked their employees to come up with original projects, and if there was a good and viable idea, it could get developed. Felipe was an employee at Squad for some time when one day he couldn't take the stress of marketing anymore. He tried to quit, but the owners insisted he instead presented a viable video game project idea. 

Not really believing his luck, Felipe set out to finish a pitch document for one of his childhood projects. Kerbals are the name of the little tin foil men that manned fireworks he took apart and turned into rockets as a child in his native Brasil. Four and a half years later, we are proud to present the outcome of this endeavor, Kerbal Space Program 1.0.

Nutshell was born from years of frustration with complicated, ugly, and expensive CRM software that required full-time admins to operate. Our vision was to create a sales platform that was simple enough for anyone to use, and more in line with the intuitive app experiences that SaaS users were coming to expect.

After bringing on CTO Andy Fowler to spearhead the product’s development, Nutshell launched to acclaim in 2010, and since then, we’ve helped tens of thousands of businesses get organized and sell smarter. We’re passionate about our customers’ success, and we love finding new ways to take the pain out of selling.

Under the leadership of CEO Joe Malcoun since 2014, Nutshell is now a category leader in everything from sales process automation to customer support, and boasts a wide range of business software integrations that allow sales reps to do all their selling from a single tool.

Nutshell is headquartered in Ann Arbor, Michigan, where it’s a central force in the city’s thriving technology and business communities. The company is backed by Plymouth Growth Partners, CKM Capital, Cahoots Capital, and Detroit Innovate.

column119:
The Yampa Valley Electric Association (YVEA) serves nearly 26,500 meters over 2,840 miles of line. YVEA's service territory extends east to the continental divide, south to almost I-70, north into Wyoming about 10 miles, and west to within 25 miles of the Utah border. The 7,000 square mile service territory includes the communities of Baggs and Savery, Wyoming; Craig, Hayden, Steamboat Springs, and Yampa, Colorado; and surrounds, but does not include the town of Oak Creek, Colorado.

YVEA employs more than 60 dedicated staff in four departments – Operations, Engineering, Consumer Accounts, and Finance/Human Resources. Diane Johnson serves as President and General Manager of YVEA. The member/owners of the cooperative elect nine individuals from the general membership to represent them as Board of Directors. Three Directors are elected each year on a rotating basis.

Yampa Valley Electric owns no generation facilities. It purchases power from the Western Area Power Administration (a federal power marketing agency) and Xcel Energy.

column105: 90 Clairton Boulevard, Pittsburgh, PA, United States
column119:
Helping Business Connect to Millennials with Video. Millennia Multimedia is a professional video production and video marketing agency in the Pittsburgh Area helping companies, organizations and marketing teams reach the Millennial audience effectively. Millennia Multimedia aims to strengthen your business brand through data-driven, creative strategy and video content production. 

Digital Video is the most direct connection between your brand and the market. Brightcove research found that over 74% of consumers say there is a connection between watching a video on social media and their purchasing decision-making process. They also found that video drives a 157% increase in organic traffic from search engines. With B2B thought-leadership, influencer marketing, and account-based marketing videos on the rise, it's no wonder why Forbes found that 65% of business decision-makers visit a marketer’s website after viewing a branded video. Video Marketing is not a fad, by 2019, Forbes projects that 80% of web traffic will be video-based.  We provide the best in video production for plug and play content marketing. Our monthly custom enterprise packages nimbly cater to producing timely and relevant video content for your needs.

Visual Content Is Vital For Reaching Millennials. When it comes to marketing content, tactics like sales presentations and lengthy reports does not get far with Millennials, who favor short-form, visual content. An online marketing and social video research project from Animoto taught us that 60% of Millennials would prefer to watch a video than read a newsletter, and 80% find company videos helpful when doing product research.

column105: 301 E 57th St, New York, United States
column119:
750+ People. 3 Continents. 18 Offices. We are a global integrated marketing agency transforming and inspiring the world of communications every day.

A LETTER FROM PETER FINN:

DECEMBER 2011. FINN PARTNERS WAS BORN. After 11 years serving as co-CEO of an historic agency that carried my father’s name— and mine!—and after 30+ years of working at the firm, I wanted to build something different, bold, meaningful and amazing for clients, our colleagues and the community. "Amazing"​ was, and is, for me an important word. I imagined we could be "amazing"​ every day, knowing this is a goal not always achieved but always pursued. A place where talented people could gather and do big things for clients as well as make a difference to the communities important to us.

WE LAUNCHED WITH A GROUP WHO SHARED A VISION. This was to be a "new"​ agency model, driven by a collaborative spirit. We asked, "Can we bind our 60-year legacy to the energy and speed of today’s hi-tech world?"​ We had $24 million in fees at our founding. Today, we have more than $85 million in fees, over 700 colleagues and 18 offices across three continents. Our Founding Managing Partners, highly respected colleagues who took the leap with me from our former agency, have been joined by the principals of other great agencies that became Finn Partner companies. So many other talented individuals are with us, too, intrigued by the idea of doing amazing things in an amazing workplace community.

WE’VE MADE OUR MARK QUICKLY. Finn Partners has been named “Best New Agency,” “Best PR Agency to Work for in North America” and“Best Mid-Sized Agency of the Year” three times. Now, we’re one of the world’s largest agencies.

WE ARE A YOUNG AGENCY. We share the genes of a respected agency that pioneered today’s integrated communications. But we are not them. We are unique. We are ourselves. We are focused on the future, building that future during each amazing day.

column119:
WHO WE ARE

We are a team of business minded, people-focused, creative marketing strategists. We are small business advocates, and agents of social change. We believe big isn’t always better, and that empathy and emotional connection are the foundation of effective marketing. We love what we do and we’re passionate about the clients we work with.

WHAT WE DO

Green Gate is a full-service marketing agency that prioritizes people and relationships. We partner with small businesses and nonprofits to develop integrated marketing strategies that bring people into the heart of a brand, whether that means they stay loyal to a family business or that they become more active in the community work of a nonprofit. 

HOW WE DO IT

Our work is based on the belief that it’s the feeling we get from a brand that inspires us to take action. A brand can create a sense of belonging, ignite our passions and incite our outrage, spark our empathy, or make us laugh. It is out of this emotional connection that we build our strategy.

What are we? 
We are an award-winning digital marketing agency with a serious ability to generate demand and nurture leads. In a nutshell, we get you the kind of results you hire an agency for.  

We believe in the power of a shared mindset. Marketing doesn’t have to transform what people believe, but it should galvanize the like-minded into action. It should create connections that will push your business forward.

Win-win situations are what we’re designing. Connecting you with your right-fit customers. Your future brand ambassadors. The people who can provide thoughtful feedback that keeps you in step with the marketplace. It’s driving more than sales, more than transactions; it’s driving deep affinities only relationships can deliver, making growth inevitable. 

Who are we? 
We are bold and resourceful. Energized and curious. Ready to solve problems and eager to apply new ideas. The shared mindset starts with the agency you partner with. This is the brave territory where we come together, and it’s harder to get there if you’re not having fun. 

Our mission is to be our clients’ greatest asset. Our mantra is, Enjoy Your Agency.

Our dedicated and exclusive commercial partnership with UEFA has been the driving force behind the phenomenal growth of the UEFA Champions League for more than 25 years.

We have also played an integral part in developing a highly valuable, truly global platform for all of UEFA's club competitions.

We exist to create and deliver long-term value for UEFA’s club competitions. We achieve enduring success because we believe in constantly developing and delivering best-in-class solutions and results for UEFA and its partners. We believe football isn’t just a sport that you watch, it’s an experience to be felt and remembered.


Who we are

We are a dynamic blend of nationalities, cultures and professional skillsets. Together we have created a remarkable business environment that draws inspiration from the famous "TEAM spirit"​.

We constantly strive to deliver industry-leading quality and excellence in everything we do.


What we do

For over twenty-five years, we have leveraged our values and our expertise to develop personalised and highly innovative solutions for UEFA and its commercial partners. At TEAM, it is our constant pursuit of excellence that sets us apart in the world of sports marketing. We are a full-service agency focused on delivering the best products: UEFA’s club competition media, sponsorship and licensing rights. Our success is only possible because we have built a team of leading specialists and experts in their respective fields:

•	our marketing division develops innovative commercial concepts, validated with leading research, to increase long-term value

Welcome to Oneupweb. Our team thrives on helping busy marketers achieve big goals by improving their business presence online.

Our expert digital marketers, developers and creatives work together to support our clients with strong, cross-channel strategy and all the creative assets that go with it. During our 20+ years in business, we shined in the dot-com boom, stayed on the forefront of SEO, and weathered difficult economic recession. Our team is made up of lifelong marketers, talented videographers, ex-journalists, foodies, copyeditors and passionate community members. We’ve assembled the perfect mix of analytical, left-brained marketers and emotional, creative, right-brained marketers all working together to deliver effective campaigns.

Some people think in extremes. Right or wrong, black or white. But your potential customers’ needs are not black and white, and individuals perceive media differently. Oneupweb digital marketing strategies happen in a challenging, exciting gray area because that’s what works.

column119:
FYI
• We charge $200+ per hour
• If this minimum fee doesn't work for you, find another partner (we won't negotiate)

QUESTIONS
• brian@growthwizards.net

HISTORY
• In 2007, Brian Rabben, our CEO, quit a VERY promising career at Google to found Ad Hatter Advertising, a digital advertising agency that focused on serving socially responsible businesses
• Ad Hatter Advertising evolved into Growth🔮WIzards, a full-service growth marketing agency​ that offers consulting services from the best growth marketers in the world
• Growth🔮WIzards works with a diverse portfolio of clients, from post-product-market-fit startups (e.g. Headspace, Lime) to large nonprofits (e.g. Heifer.org, ShareOurStrength.org)

HOW WE CAN HELP
Growth🔮WIzards can help you...

1.) 📊 Install & configure advanced mobile, web, & multichannel analytics software (e.g. Adobe Analytics, Amplitude, Google Analytics (Premium), Kissmetrics, Mixpanel, etc.)

2.) 🤓 Design & implement a Quantitative Growth Model, & Growth Experimentation Framework customized to suit the unique needs of your business:
• Approach / Philosophy:  We base our Growth Models & Growth Experimentation Frameworks on learnings from Brian Balfour’s & Andrew Chen’s 8-week growth nerd ‘post-doc’ program, Reforge.com
• Software:  We use NorthStar by GrowthHackers.com by default

3.) ♻️ Ideate, prioritize, test, analyze, rinse, repeat:
• We’ll help you run the most promising short, medium, & long-term Growth Experiments
• We recommend “high tempo testing” (running at least one significant Growth Experiment per week)

4.) 👩🏽‍💻 Assemble and manage a team of growth experts (analysts, community managers, data scientists, growth marketers, PR ninjas, social media mavens, and more) to execute the tactical elements of these Growth Experiments for you

5.) 🥅 Set and achieve realistic, data-driven goals

6.) 📈 Determine the most appropriate KPIs to monitor + how often

7.) 🤑 Help you raise money*

😎 Or, all of the above.

* Case-by-case basis

column105: 301 E 57th St, New York, United States
column119:
750+ People. 3 Continents. 18 Offices. We are a global integrated marketing agency transforming and inspiring the world of communications every day.

A LETTER FROM PETER FINN:

DECEMBER 2011. FINN PARTNERS WAS BORN. After 11 years serving as co-CEO of an historic agency that carried my father’s name— and mine!—and after 30+ years of working at the firm, I wanted to build something different, bold, meaningful and amazing for clients, our colleagues and the community. "Amazing"​ was, and is, for me an important word. I imagined we could be "amazing"​ every day, knowing this is a goal not always achieved but always pursued. A place where talented people could gather and do big things for clients as well as make a difference to the communities important to us.

WE LAUNCHED WITH A GROUP WHO SHARED A VISION. This was to be a "new"​ agency model, driven by a collaborative spirit. We asked, "Can we bind our 60-year legacy to the energy and speed of today’s hi-tech world?"​ We had $24 million in fees at our founding. Today, we have more than $85 million in fees, over 700 colleagues and 18 offices across three continents. Our Founding Managing Partners, highly respected colleagues who took the leap with me from our former agency, have been joined by the principals of other great agencies that became Finn Partner companies. So many other talented individuals are with us, too, intrigued by the idea of doing amazing things in an amazing workplace community.

WE’VE MADE OUR MARK QUICKLY. Finn Partners has been named “Best New Agency,” “Best PR Agency to Work for in North America” and“Best Mid-Sized Agency of the Year” three times. Now, we’re one of the world’s largest agencies.

WE ARE A YOUNG AGENCY. We share the genes of a respected agency that pioneered today’s integrated communications. But we are not them. We are unique. We are ourselves. We are focused on the future, building that future during each amazing day.

iProspect is a global, award-winning marketing agency that drives digital performance for many of the world’s largest brands. A trusted partner with an in-depth understanding of consumer behavior, iProspect reshapes brand strategies to meet the fast-paced demands of the convergent world with a focus on exceeding the client’s business objectives. iProspect delivers personal, adaptive and valuable digital experiences utilizing proprietary solutions including: paid and natural search, content generation, data & insights, social media management, structured data and feeds, performance display, mobile strategy, video, conversion optimization and affiliates.
 
Partnering with clients such as adidas, Diageo, Hilton, Burberry, General Motors, Procter & Gamble, Gucci, and Microsoft, iProspect has been named the “Best Agency for Performance Marketing” by iMedia, and represents more retailers on Internet Retailer’s Top 500 List than any other agency. Global President, Ruth Stubbs, recently received top honors as the Vision winner for the first Women Leading Change Awards presented by Campaign360. iProspect is part of the Dentsu Aegis Network, a wholly owned subsidiary of Dentsu Inc.

column105: 301 E 57th St, New York, United States
column119:
750+ People. 3 Continents. 18 Offices. We are a global integrated marketing agency transforming and inspiring the world of communications every day.

A LETTER FROM PETER FINN:

DECEMBER 2011. FINN PARTNERS WAS BORN. After 11 years serving as co-CEO of an historic agency that carried my father’s name— and mine!—and after 30+ years of working at the firm, I wanted to build something different, bold, meaningful and amazing for clients, our colleagues and the community. "Amazing"​ was, and is, for me an important word. I imagined we could be "amazing"​ every day, knowing this is a goal not always achieved but always pursued. A place where talented people could gather and do big things for clients as well as make a difference to the communities important to us.

WE LAUNCHED WITH A GROUP WHO SHARED A VISION. This was to be a "new"​ agency model, driven by a collaborative spirit. We asked, "Can we bind our 60-year legacy to the energy and speed of today’s hi-tech world?"​ We had $24 million in fees at our founding. Today, we have more than $85 million in fees, over 700 colleagues and 18 offices across three continents. Our Founding Managing Partners, highly respected colleagues who took the leap with me from our former agency, have been joined by the principals of other great agencies that became Finn Partner companies. So many other talented individuals are with us, too, intrigued by the idea of doing amazing things in an amazing workplace community.

WE’VE MADE OUR MARK QUICKLY. Finn Partners has been named “Best New Agency,” “Best PR Agency to Work for in North America” and“Best Mid-Sized Agency of the Year” three times. Now, we’re one of the world’s largest agencies.

WE ARE A YOUNG AGENCY. We share the genes of a respected agency that pioneered today’s integrated communications. But we are not them. We are unique. We are ourselves. We are focused on the future, building that future during each amazing day.

Precision is an integrated strategy and marketing agency with offices in Washington, DC and New York City. 

In re-electing President Barack Obama, Precision co-founders Stephanie Cutter, Jen O'Malley Dillon, and Teddy Goff pioneered the politics of precision - building and leading an unprecedented campaign to understand, reach, and connect with more Americans than ever before. Precision applies everything learned and affirmed through years of experience to help companies, causes, and campaigns to change peoples minds and move them to action.

Our roots are in politics, but we work with clients in just about every industry you can think of, facing a diverse set of challenges and reaching toward a diverse set of goals.

We've been an integrated agency since day one, with world-class experts in each of our practice areas: communications, creative, digital, data, advertising, and mobilization.

At Back to Black Agency, we understand that all marketing serves a purpose. That purpose is to add more black ink to our clients’ bottom line! Through the digital efforts of our online marketing company in Utah, we focus on the avenues that provide the greatest short and long-term ROI.  

Based on our years of experience in the marketing industry, we founded our company on 3 main principles:  

1)  No Long Term Contracts

Trust is very important when working with a new marketing partner and we believe that it’s earned through efforts, not given. We work on a month to month basis from the start to earn your trust and business for years to come.

2)  Transparency

We never want our clients to wonder what we’re doing for their investment We want them to know everything every step of the way. At our monthly meetings, we go over detailed reports that show all the work that’s being done and the impact it is having on the business.

3)  Results

column105: 301 E 57th St, New York, United States
column119:
750+ People. 3 Continents. 18 Offices. We are a global integrated marketing agency transforming and inspiring the world of communications every day.

A LETTER FROM PETER FINN:

DECEMBER 2011. FINN PARTNERS WAS BORN. After 11 years serving as co-CEO of an historic agency that carried my father’s name— and mine!—and after 30+ years of working at the firm, I wanted to build something different, bold, meaningful and amazing for clients, our colleagues and the community. "Amazing"​ was, and is, for me an important word. I imagined we could be "amazing"​ every day, knowing this is a goal not always achieved but always pursued. A place where talented people could gather and do big things for clients as well as make a difference to the communities important to us.

WE LAUNCHED WITH A GROUP WHO SHARED A VISION. This was to be a "new"​ agency model, driven by a collaborative spirit. We asked, "Can we bind our 60-year legacy to the energy and speed of today’s hi-tech world?"​ We had $24 million in fees at our founding. Today, we have more than $85 million in fees, over 700 colleagues and 18 offices across three continents. Our Founding Managing Partners, highly respected colleagues who took the leap with me from our former agency, have been joined by the principals of other great agencies that became Finn Partner companies. So many other talented individuals are with us, too, intrigued by the idea of doing amazing things in an amazing workplace community.

WE’VE MADE OUR MARK QUICKLY. Finn Partners has been named “Best New Agency,” “Best PR Agency to Work for in North America” and“Best Mid-Sized Agency of the Year” three times. Now, we’re one of the world’s largest agencies.

WE ARE A YOUNG AGENCY. We share the genes of a respected agency that pioneered today’s integrated communications. But we are not them. We are unique. We are ourselves. We are focused on the future, building that future during each amazing day.

750+ People. 3 Continents. 18 Offices. We are a global integrated marketing agency transforming and inspiring the world of communications every day.

A LETTER FROM PETER FINN:

DECEMBER 2011. FINN PARTNERS WAS BORN. After 11 years serving as co-CEO of an historic agency that carried my father’s name— and mine!—and after 30+ years of working at the firm, I wanted to build something different, bold, meaningful and amazing for clients, our colleagues and the community. "Amazing"​ was, and is, for me an important word. I imagined we could be "amazing"​ every day, knowing this is a goal not always achieved but always pursued. A place where talented people could gather and do big things for clients as well as make a difference to the communities important to us.

WE LAUNCHED WITH A GROUP WHO SHARED A VISION. This was to be a "new"​ agency model, driven by a collaborative spirit. We asked, "Can we bind our 60-year legacy to the energy and speed of today’s hi-tech world?"​ We had $24 million in fees at our founding. Today, we have more than $85 million in fees, over 700 colleagues and 18 offices across three continents. Our Founding Managing Partners, highly respected colleagues who took the leap with me from our former agency, have been joined by the principals of other great agencies that became Finn Partner companies. So many other talented individuals are with us, too, intrigued by the idea of doing amazing things in an amazing workplace community.

WE’VE MADE OUR MARK QUICKLY. Finn Partners has been named “Best New Agency,” “Best PR Agency to Work for in North America” and“Best Mid-Sized Agency of the Year” three times. Now, we’re one of the world’s largest agencies.

WE ARE A YOUNG AGENCY. We share the genes of a respected agency that pioneered today’s integrated communications. But we are not them. We are unique. We are ourselves. We are focused on the future, building that future during each amazing day.

Fatfree Studio is an integrated interactive marketing agency with expertise that extends beyond the web. In addition to breakthrough websites, eCommerce, social media applications, online advertising and media planning, clients look to us to extend communications across all channels, including branding, print and out-of-home advertising, videos, sales collateral and more. 

Fatfree Studio was founded on the idea that if you could work directly with the core team responsible for creating and deploying your work, we could offer a better product, on tighter timelines, with greater economy. We help clients of every type and size identify and execute the most effective, cost-efficient solutions for communicating with their audiences. Our attitude, approach and award-winning work keep clients coming back, project after project. It’s a formula that works—in fact, every client we have is the result of a referral. 

So here we are — a digital agency that truly enjoys creating smart strategies, new ideas and great work for our clients. Visit our website to get to know us better.

🎉 Celebrating 25 Years 🎉 

Founded in 1998, The Syndicate is an independent entertainment marketing agency providing full-scale, integrated marketing programs from ideation through execution. Our diverse client roster includes consumer brands, TV/streaming networks, record labels, live venues, podcasts, film companies, non-profit organizations, emerging technologies, comedians, and GRAMMY® award-winning artists. Custom programs for individual projects and long-term campaigns incorporate our in-house services:

- Brand Strategy 
- Digital Marketing & Advertising 
- Event Marketing 
- Experiential Activations 
- Experiential Activations 
- Grassroots Marketing / Brand Ambassadors
- Label Services & Consulting
- Media Planning & Out-of-Home Advertising
- Publicity
- Radio Promotion
- Social Media Marketing & Management
- ...and more!

Our passionate team looks forward to helping new clients meet and exceed their goals!
